definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
(coll.) to break loose/to shake off responsibility

sentences.english: Be careful, that's a catch question.
sentences.chinese: 你可要当心，那个问题是个套儿。

sentences.english: She had planned it all and waited for him to fall into the trap.
sentences.chinese: 一切都是她布置好的，单等他来上套儿。

definition: lit. please Sir, get into the boiling pot (idiom)/fig. to give sb a taste of his own medicine
to scam/to set a trap/to set up a scheme to defraud people
lit. the plum tree withers in place of the peach tree/to substitute one thing for another/to carry the can for sb
erhua variant of 缺心眼[que1 xin1 yan3]
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
lit. the cicada sheds its carapace (idiom); fig. to vanish leaving an empty shell/a crafty escape plan
erhua variant of 窯姐|窑姐[yao2 jie3]
